name: Cosmonkey and The Rainbawnana Maze
description:
A cosmos monkey? Rainbow bananas? What is going on here!?

Help Cosmonkey, the cute little monkey with a star shaped tail, to find the exit of the labyrinth. To do so you'll have to guide him to all the Rainbawnanas you can pick up to summon the mighty and wise Satelliturtle, unlocking the exit and guiding to its location. Beware of the tricky walls which are sometimes difficult to see ;)

  • Use the arrow keys to move Cosmonkey.
  • Use Esc to pause.

A new maze is created every time you reach the exit. The game never ends, so keep this in mind while playing!
